itunes:subtitle: Journalists Danny Gold and Sean Williams talk about their podcast ‘The Underworld’ — about organized crime around the world. Williams and Gold talk about going to an illegal Chinese casino where people were eating tigers, being embedded with rebel groups...
itunes:summary:
Journalists Danny Gold and Sean Williams talk about their podcast ‘The Underworld’ — about organized crime around the world. Williams and Gold talk about going to an illegal Chinese casino where people were eating tigers, being embedded with rebel groups fighting ISIS in Syria, and looking for the world’s biggest meth producer in Malaysia.
